body:
a fresh installation of GCC results in a broken `gfortran`:
```
configure:33278: /Users/davydden/spack/lib/spack/env/clang/gfortran -o conftest    conftest.f  >&5
ld: file not found: n-dynamic
collect2: error: ld returned 1 exit status
```
(this is the error log from `openmpi` configure).

I did have `6.3.0` working (built around January), it could be related to dependencies. I don't recall any OSX updates in the last couple of months.
title: gcc6.3.0 is  broken on Sierra 10.12.3
